uk.ac.liv.auction.core
Class ContinuousDoubleAuctioneerNoQueue

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.core.AbstractAuctioneer

          uk.ac.liv.auction.core.ContinuousDoubleAuctioneer
              uk.ac.liv.auction.core.ContinuousDoubleAuctioneerNoQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Auctioneer, QuoteProvider, AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable
public class ContinuousDoubleAuctioneerNoQueue
extends ContinuousDoubleAuctioneer
implements java.io.Serializable

An auctioneer for a k-double-auction with continuous clearing and no order queuing. Every time an offer is cleared any pending offers are discarded.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
Serialized Form
